history.content: Yes you can declare as long as you get a B- or higher in stat 135. You can also retake 134 with the adjunct if you want to, since stat 134 knowledge will be core to most upper div stats classes and the adjunct provide tremendous opportunity for you to learn together with hardworking students and tutors. Good luck!
We are unable to advise on other department's requirements.

children.subject: +1. I probably would've gotten 2 grade worse.
Adding to the student answer, to anyone interested in taking Stat 134 I highly recommend taking the adjunct course. I wouldn't have done anywhere near as well as I did without that course

history.content:
If I got below a B- in Stat 134, can I take Stat 135 and get a B- or above before declaring to fullfill the 

"Students must also earn a B- in either Stat 134, Stat 140* or Stat 135, with no more than one course repeated between Stat 134 (or Stat 140) and Stat 135." Would post in a stats page, but I dont see any stats 101 piazza page anywhere.
history.subject: Stat 135 question
